name: Vigor
uniques: [This Unit] gains the [Invigorated] status for [3] turn(s)

name: Invigorated
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units

name: Grant Teleportation

name: Heal Instantly

name: Summon
uniques: Free [Force Bolt] appears <costs [10] [Mana]> <for [1] movement> <removing the [Summon] promotion/status> <when number of [Carried [Air] units] is less than [2]>
